entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Matagami
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:52 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Matagami Airport 10:00 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -1.4°C
Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -6.0°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 60%
